idea: Hi, coppEX - the vision of future is a startup found by Mr. Swastik Mehta in 2020. We are looking for seed funding for our venture which is highly profitable with guaranteed quick returns. We at coppEX recycle scrap copper to copper ingots which is very high in demand and the supply today isn’t being able to meet. Looking forward to hearing your feedback. You can connect with us at 9930185641/9930209281
name: coppEX

idea: C-TAP Services Pvt. idea:
We love what we do

 Our talented team leverages your business using digital technology and latest marketing trends.

Experience like you’ve never had before

We are a professional, transparent team with 4+ years of experience building software and digital presence for brands. You work directly with our CEO and Head of the department for all the digital solutions for your business or personal brand.

You should join our hand with us

Top Talent

You will be hiring experienced people for the amazing result for your business.

Scaleable

Start Nimble and grow your business with the latest digital trends

Our Culture

Consider us as an extension of your company, your culture, your process.


We focus on leveraging business using digital marketing and the latest technology.

Strategy & Consulting

To truly accelerate growth and effectiveness through digital business transformation requires the fusion of customer experience, strategy and consulting.

Web & App Development

Digitizing spreadsheets to building complex application using the latest technologies, our customized services empowers applications to evolve and reinvent processes – enabling you to deliver reliable, stable and faster results.

Digital Marketing

Businesses leverage digital channels such as search engines, social media, email, and other websites to connect with current and prospective customers.

Photography & Videography

We offer stunning videos, animations, films & media production services with ultra-modern video shooting equipment & high skilled professionals.

Outdoor Marketing

Outdoor advertising is to communicate with people while they are out of their home

SMS Marketing

SMS helps organizations sends promotional and transactional text messages to their intended audience group using our best bulk SMS software.

Whatsapp Marketing

Whatsapp is now a household messaging application engagement rate is very high. You will see tangible results in growth and business outreach once you collaborate with us

Product Support

We help you to provides the end-user with a resource for information regarding your product/services while you focus on the growth of your business

Content Writing

We have professional writers who produce an engaging context for content marketing. After all, content is king.
name: Webink Media LLP
